Package spec.reporter

A reporter for SPECjvm2008 that produces html and text reports from the raw xml files the harness produces.

Package spec.reporter Description

A reporter for SPECjvm2008 that produces html and text reports from the raw xml files the harness produces. Also handles the submission process by preparing and processing the file(s).
